name: Mad Machines
description:
Master fast-paced magnetic mechanics to become the ultimate machine in a mad world of sports.
Choose between several unique robot gladiators, team up with other players and carefully carve the lethal spike-ball through enemy lines to score before they get a piece of you.
Hit the ball in any way you like; control the power and speed of any attack available from your chosen character model - basics and specials, left or right.
How and where you hit the ball makes a world of difference, practice positioning and timing to achieve those epic moments where you see the ball drive through the air with enough speed to break the goal shield, and maybe wreck an enemy on the way.
Dribble and trick enemies using your magnet, push the ball into position for that ultra high-speed sonic hit, or simply pass the ball to your teammates
Jump into a unique combat experience driven by the pure satisfaction of breaking your opponent into bits and pieces. Fighting enemies breaks apart their panzer and automatically becomes added to yours.
Play, win, and rank up. Experience the precision and perfection of a Mad Machines match!
In Mad Machines, you play as a panzer-plated robot gladiator, an armor comprised of many pieces. You live and feed of your armor. Lose your panzer and you will find yourself in deep trouble.
We have worked hard to achieve a natural freedom of movement on the field as well as implemented several real time systems for both characters, ball, and armor.
Multiplayer Experience:
Competitive, team-based game modes.
Skill-based mechanics, easy to learn but hard to master.
Server-client architecture which supports up to 10 players in a match.
Unique health system:
Health is based on remaining the pieces of your panzer.
Real-time visual health degradation as the panzer breaks apart
Steal panzer pieces from opponents or regenerate more in your goalzone.
Ball interaction:
Real time dynamic physics.
Precision impact systems.
Special Spikeball mode triggered by ball speed.
Magnet mechanic allows for great ball control both on ground and in the air.
Special abilities:
Multiple models to pick from.
Advanced combo and combat systems.
Different combat specials and panzer specials based on model.
